name: PixelMagic
changelog:
• Fixed GCAM
  • Enabled new google statusbar icons
  • Enabled new notifications flag
  • Added feature "Force LTE CA"
  • Fixed one memory leak
  • Added DT2S statusbar gesture
  • Added VPN tethering feature
  • Added separate Wifi/Mobile data QS tiles
  • Added some amount of other QS tiles and gestures
  • Other UI improvements
notes:
• Magicxavi also maintains RisingOS, crDroid 10, PixelMagic 14 and YAAP.
  • Bugs: Portrait and night mode in miui camera not working, Fingerprint, Maybe more
  • Use the latest boot.img from notes.
  • Thanks to all my contributors :)
